#include <iostream>
#include <cstdio>

using namespace std;

int seq[6000000];

int main(void)
{    
    int t, n, k, arr[10], tot, i, j, num, temp[10], last, ans, flag;
    scanf("%d", &t);
    
    while (t--)
    {
        scanf("%d %d", &n, &k);
        
        tot = 0;        
        for (i = 1; i <= n; i++)
        {
            j = i;
            num = 0;            
            while (j != 0)
            {
                arr[num] = j % 10;
                num++;
                j /= 10;    
            }
            
            for (j = num - 1; j > -1; j--)
            {
                seq[tot] = arr[j];
                tot++;
            }
        }
        
        num = 0;
        while (k != 0)
        {
            temp[num] = k % 10;
            num++;
            k /= 10;    
        }
        
        for (j = num - 1; j > -1; j--)
        {
            arr[num - 1 - j] = temp[j]; 
        } 
        
        ans = 0;
        last = tot - num + 1;
        for (i = 0; i < last; i++)
        {
            flag = 0;
            for (j = i, k = 0; k < num; k++, j++)
            {
                if (arr[k] != seq[j])
                {
                    flag = 1;
                    break;
                }    
            }
            
            if (flag == 0)    ans++;     
        } 
        
        printf("%d\n", ans);      
    }
    
    return 0;
}
